title: get all products with filtering
description: Verify that the GET /api/products endpoint returns a list of products filtered correctly by main_category, category, and active status parameters.

title: create new product with variants
description: Verify that the POST /api/products endpoint allows an admin to create a new product with required fields and optional variants, and returns appropriate error for missing required fields.

title: get product by id
description: Verify that the GET /api/products/{id} endpoint returns the correct product details for a valid product ID and returns 404 for a non-existent product ID.

title: update product details and variants
description: Verify that the PATCH /api/products/{id} endpoint allows an admin to update product details and variants, and returns appropriate error on server failure.

title: delete product and variants
description: Verify that the DELETE /api/products/{id} endpoint allows an admin to delete a product and its variants, and handles server errors gracefully.

title: create new order with customer details
description: Verify that the POST /api/orders endpoint creates a new order with required customer details and items, generates a valid WhatsApp checkout URL, and returns errors for missing required fields.

title: get orders by phone or order number
description: Verify that the GET /api/orders endpoint returns orders filtered by phone number or order number, and returns error if neither parameter is provided.

title: update order status with inventory handling
description: Verify that the PATCH /api/orders/{id}/status endpoint allows an admin to update order status, handles inventory release on cancellation, and returns errors for invalid status or server issues.

title: cleanup expired reservations cron job
description: Verify that the POST /api/cron/cleanup-reservations endpoint triggers the cleanup of expired inventory reservations and cancels expired orders, enforcing authorization and handling errors.

title: order status change webhook processing
description: Verify that the POST /api/webhooks/order-status endpoint processes order status change notifications, triggers WhatsApp messages, and returns appropriate errors for missing data or non-existent orders.
